name: Silver Island Demo
description:
The once semi peaceful ghetto's of Silver Island are no longer semi peaceful, however unlike the normal amounts of crime associated with urban decay,the streets are flooded with hordes of zombies, ghoulies and other assorted uglies.

Join Johnny Chainsaw as he searches the island for a way to close the gate to the underworld, save some missing kids and most importantly, avenge the death of his cat who was eaten by zombies.

_Features

-Expansive, detailed 16 bit style open world map.


-More than 50 different weapons and armor pieces to find.

-Three different endings based on Decisions made and objectives met.

-Weapon/Armor pairing system that boosts stats

-Lots of Side quests !
-Violence !
-Zombies !
-Kittens !
-Puzzles !
-Platforming !
-Even more violence !
-Kung fu fighting !

This is the Demo release of Silver Island. If you dig it, please consider buying the full version !
